Basic examples¶

Contents

  • Basic examples
    • DSSP analysis
    • hbond analysis
    • More examples

DSSP analysis¶

In [1]: import pytraj as pt

In [2]: pdb = pt.load_pdb_rcsb("1l2y")

In [3]: result = pt.dssp(pdb)

In [4]: print(result)
[['ASN:1' 'LEU:2' 'TYR:3' ..., 'PRO:18' 'PRO:19' 'SER:20']
 [array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['H', 'T', '0', ..., 'H', '0', 'T'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['H', 'H', 'H', ..., 'H', 'H', 'H'], 
      dtype='<U1') ...,
  array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')]]

hbond analysis¶

In [5]: hbonds = pt.search_hbonds(pdb)

In [6]: hbonds
Out[6]: 
<pytraj.DatasetList with 32 datasets>
total_solute_hbonds
[6 7 8 ..., 7 6 6]

ASN1_O-GLN5_N-H
[1 0 0 ..., 0 0 0]

ARG16_O-TRP6_NE1-HE1
[1 1 1 ..., 1 1 1]
...

ASP9_OD2-SER14_OG-HG
[0 0 0 ..., 0 0 0]

ASP9_OD2-ARG16_NH1-HH11
[0 0 0 ..., 0 0 0]
